I install KerbalKonstructs.

Everlasting static land between the earth and the sky,

SQUAD allows addon statics to be destructible.

Your hill soon to come crashing down (because kerbals blow buildings up all the time).
I add boosters to the hill and fly it to orbit. My orbiting hill.

I use Spanish "don Quijote" space project

URL for info: [https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Quijote_(spacecraft)](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Quijote_%28spacecraft%29)

It impact, but don't destroy the hill, after that the hill boosters control system lose the control, slow too the orbital speed and disable 68% of boosters.

Now hill is falling again to the earth, full out of control (turning in the 3 axys)

Your out of control-falling on earth hill
